body.p: When editing LESS files, you can compile the files into CSS. provides both manual and automatic options to compile LESS stylesheets into CSS.

You have two options for compiling LESS files to CSS:
Use the contextual menu in a LESS file and select Compile to CSS ().
Enable the option Automatically compile LESS to CSS when saving in the settings. To do so and go to Editor Open Save Save hooks . If enabled, when you save a LESS file it will automatically be compiled to CSS (this option is disabled by default).If this option is enabled, when you save a LESS file, the CSS file that has the same name as the LESS file is overwritten without warning. Make sure all your changes are made in the LESS file. Do not edit the CSS file directly, as your changes might be lost.
